name: better-chatbot
description: This skill provides project-specific coding conventions, architectural principles, repository structure standards, testing patterns, and contribution guidelines for the better-chatbot project (https://github.com/cgoinglove/better-chatbot). Use this skill when contributing to or working with better-chatbot to understand the design philosophy and ensure code follows established patterns. Includes: API architecture deep-dive, three-tier tool system (MCP/Workflow/Default), component design patterns, database repository patterns, architectural principles (progressive enhancement, defensive programming, streaming-first), practical templates for adding features (tools, routes, repositories). Use when: working in better-chatbot repository, contributing features/fixes, understanding architectural decisions, following server action validators, implementing tools/workflows, setting up Playwright tests, adding API routes, designing database queries, building UI components, handling multi-AI provider integration
